ass_set.question: What is energy?
ass_set.standard_ans: Energy is the ability to do work.
ass_set.student_answer: Energy the capacity for doing work.

ass_set.question: Define force.
ass_set.standard_ans: In physics, a force is an influence that can change the motion of an object.
ass_set.student_answer: Push or pull of an object is considered a force.

ass_set.question: What is Friction?
ass_set.standard_ans: Friction is the resistance to motion of one object moving relative to another
ass_set.student_answer: Friction is force which act toward applied force on a object.

ass_set.question: Newton's third law.
ass_set.standard_ans: For every action (force) in nature there is an equal and opposite reaction.
ass_set.student_answer: Every action has an equal and opposite reaction.

ass_set.question: What is velocity?
ass_set.standard_ans: Velocity is the rate at which the position changes.
ass_set.student_answer: Velocity can be defined as the displacement of the object in unit time.
